page.title: 09WILBERFOSS POST LADY
page.content: The Wilberfoss post lady usually gets up at 5.30am.Then she goes to the post office where she starts the round with the other post lady.The other post lady does a larger portion of the village post.Both of them do their rounds on bicycles. She enjoys her work because she gets out in the fresh air and has the opportunity of meeting lots of people. She can also keep a friendly eye on elderly people living on their own. After her round she does not go back to bed, but she goes to bed early at 10.00pm each evening. She has two weeks annual holiday each year during which time the other post lady does all the rounds herself. After her round is finished she often helps out in the village shop/post office. She feels that the pay she receives is good for the work that she does.
